HP P22v G5 21.45" 75Hz FHD Monitor

The HP P22v G5 is a finely built 21.45-inch Full HD monitor that provides an immersive visual experience appropriate for a wide range of functions, including professional work, entertainment, and gaming. With a Full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, the P22v G5 monitor provides clean, crisp, and colorful pictures, guaranteeing that every detail is represented precisely and clearly. The HP P22v G5 features a VA panel with a refresh rate of 75Hz and a response time of 5ms. This combination provides smooth motion handling while decreasing motion blur and ghosting. Whether you're working on graphic design projects, watching high-definition films, or playing fast-paced games, the display of P22v G5 monitor provides constant and smooth graphics. The HP P22v G5 provides a variety of connection choices to meet a wide range of demands. It has one HDMI connector and one VGA port, allowing you to connect to a wide range of devices, including PCs, laptops, game consoles, and more. This adaptability provides smooth interaction with various configurations, allowing users to easily transition between devices. The HP P22v G5 improves the user experience even further by including a series of features that focus user comfort and well-being. The HP P22v G5 monitor has an anti-glare coating that reduces reflections and glare, allowing you to watch the screen for longer durations without hurting your eyes. The HP P22v G5 monitor includes Low Blue Light technology, which filters out harmful blue light emissions, decreasing eye strain. The P22v G5 monitor has Flicker-Free technology, which prevents screen flickering, which can cause eye strain and discomfort. This provides a more pleasant viewing experience, particularly during extended work or gaming periods. The HP P22v G5 21.45-inch monitor combines great display quality, flexible connection choices, and user-friendly features. Its intelligent design and modern technology make it a dependable and adaptable solution for a variety of applications, enhancing your viewing experience and productivity.

full_description:
HP P24h G5 23.8" FHD Monitor

The HP P24h G5 23.8" Monitor will keep you relaxed while you do routine productivity chores. This reasonably priced Full HD monitor with 1920 x 1080 resolution and a space-conscious design that lets you make the most of your desktop space has a modern, utilitarian design. Simultaneously, the three-sided micro-edge bezel helps you maintain task concentration. You may watch movies and listen to music without taking up space on your desk with external speakers thanks to the integrated 2W stereo speaker system. For best viewing, adjust the tilt of the display. You can also control your screen settings using the HP Display Center and HP Display Manger tools or by using the user-friendly joypad OSD button.

Clear Display

The HP P24h G5 Monitor Boasts a 23.8" Full HD In-Plane Switching (IPS) display, this monitor provides vibrant colors across a wide spectrum of up to 16.7 million colors. With a 5 ms response time, a 1000:1 static contrast ratio, and 250 nits of brightness, it ensures clear, sharp images. The wide 178° viewing angles make this screen ideal for group settings or when viewing from different positions.

75 Hz Refresh Rate

The HP P24h G5 23.8" FHD Monitor Smooth video playback and minimal motion blur are a certainty thanks to the 75 Hz refresh rate, making it perfect for watching videos, gaming, and general multimedia tasks.

Adjustable Tilt and Height

The HP P24h G5 23.8" FHD Monitor Customize your viewing angle with an adjustable stand that offers both tilt and up to 100 mm height adjustment. This adaptability helps reduce neck strain and allows you to maintain a comfortable posture during long work hours.

Built-In Dual 2W Speakers

The HP P24h G5 FHD Monitor Integrated dual 2W speakers provide a convenient audio solution for listening to music or attending virtual meetings, eliminating the need for external speakers.

3-Sided Micro-Edge Bezel

The minimal bezel design not only looks sleek but also maximizes the screen area, which is particularly beneficial in dual-monitor setups for nearly seamless visual continuity.

Easy Joypad OSD Button

The HP P24h G5 FHD Monitor Adjusting settings are straightforward with the Joypad OSD button, simplifying how you change brightness, resolution, and other display parameters.

Low Blue Light Mode

To help reduce eye strain during prolonged use, the monitor features a low blue light mode that adjusts the screen color temperature to emit less blue light.

Eco-Friendly Design

The HP P24h G5, which is dedicated to sustainability, satisfies several environmental certifications, including ENERGY STAR certification, EPEAT registration, and TCO-certified displays. Its packaging complies with international recycling standards and is 100% recyclable.

full_description:
HP OMEN 24 23.8" 165Hz FHD IPS Gaming Monitor

The HP OMEN 24 is a 23.8-inch gaming monitor that promises an outstanding gaming experience with accuracy and clarity. The monitor's Full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080 provides sharp, vivid, and colorful pictures that fully immerse you in the game world. Its IPS screen technology offers precise color reproduction and broad viewing angles, making every detail stand out with clarity and consistency. The HP OMEN 24 is a performance powerhouse, with a high refresh rate of 165Hz and an ultra-fast GTG (Gray-to-Gray) reaction time of 1ms. This combination ensures that fast-moving graphics and action-packed situations are projected smoothly and without motion blur, allowing you to respond swiftly and keep up with the competition. Whether you're fighting in fierce FPS skirmishes, exploring enormous open worlds, or watching dramatic sequences, the monitor's high-performance display technology guarantees that everything is presented with clarity and fluidity. The HP OMEN 24 has a variety of connectivity options that are both flexible and easy to use. It has one DisplayPort, one HDMI, and one audio connection for smooth connecting to your gaming PC, consoles, and other entertainment devices. This allows you to simply switch between gaming platforms and attach extra audio equipment for a more immersive gaming experience. In terms of gaming features, the HP OMEN 24 includes AMD FreeSync and Adaptive Sync technology. These methods synchronize the monitor's refresh rate with your graphics card's frame rate, eliminating screen tearing and stuttering, resulting in a smoother and more enjoyable gaming experience. Furthermore, the monitor's Low Blue Light option is intended to lessen eye strain during lengthy gaming sessions, allowing you to play for longer periods of time while remaining comfortable. The HP OMEN 24 combines remarkable display quality, high-performance gaming capabilities, and user-friendly connectivity choices to provide gamers with a dependable and engaging gaming monitor. Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive esports player, the HP OMEN 24 can match your gaming requirements and improve your entire gaming experience.

full_description:
HP E24t G5 23.8" FHD Touch Monitor

The HP E24t G5 23.8" FHD Touch Monitor is designed to provide clear images, customized comfort, and genuine versatility, making it appropriate for usage in both home and workplace settings. With self-capacitive technology, it has 10-point in-cell multi-touch capabilities. It also has an In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel, a 1000:1 contrast ratio, 300 nits of brightness, coverage for 99% of the sRGB color gamut, 178° viewing angles, and a response time of 5 ms (GtG) with Overdrive. All of these features come with a native Full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080 with a refresh rate of 75 Hz. Utilize the one HDMI 1.4 or one DisplayPort 1.2 input to connect this monitor to your host system, or use the four USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 (3.1 Gen 1/3.0) connections—one of which is a charging port—to connect compatible devices and free up ports on your host system. This display has a tilt range of -5 to 23°, a swivel range of -45 to 45°, a pivot range of -90 to 90°, and a VESA mount of 100 x 100mm to enhance viewing and accessibility even further.

See It All, Do It All

The HP E24t G5 23.8" FHD Touch monitor's rich 99% sRGB color depth and IPS technology provide the clarity you need to maintain concentration. Additionally, take control of your productivity with the quick and responsive touchscreen made possible by integrated in-cell technology.

Bring Comfort to Work

The HP E24t G5 23.8" FHD Touch Monitor's 4-way adjustable frame makes it simple to find comfortable seating throughout the day. This frame can be modified using the extensive Ergonomic Setup Guide in the HP Display Center. Feeling your best is necessary for optimal performance. A display with flicker-free technology, an inbuilt low-blue light filter called HP Eye Ease, and a refresh rate of 75 Hz will make your eyes feel more comfortable.

Connect Intuitively

The HP E24t G5 23.8" Full HD Touch Screen allows you to work with adaptable connectivity and configurations. With the conveniently located connections, connecting your devices is quick and simple. The joypad OSD button makes it easy to move through the on-screen settings.

Design that Inspires

Spark joy on your desk and in the world with a monitor built around you. The elegant, efficient design and 3-sided micro-edge bezel elevate your office while maximizing space. Beyond the looks, feel good with a monitor that contains recycled plastics[4] and metals. Customize your space to boost your productivity with the matching accessory ecosystem.

full_description:
HP OMEN 32C 31.5" 165Hz QHD Curved Gaming Monitor

The HP OMEN 32C is a stunning 31.5-inch QHD curved gaming monitor that promises an immersive and smooth gaming experience. With a resolution of 2560 x 1440, it provides clear and vivid graphics that bring your games to life. The monitor has a VA screen with a high refresh rate of 165Hz and a GTG reaction time of 1ms, resulting in smooth and responsive gameplay with minimum motion blur. Whether you're racing through fast-paced action games or immersing yourself in cinematic adventures, the HP OMEN 32C never stops moving. A variety of connectors, including 1 x DisplayPort, 2 x HDMI, and a 3.5mm audio jack, enable you to quickly connect your gaming PC, consoles, and other devices. Additional features include AMD FreeSync technology, which helps to avoid screen tearing and stuttering, and Low Blue Light mode, which decreases eye strain during lengthy gaming sessions. The 1500R curvature of the screen wraps around your field of view, increasing immersion and making every gaming session more enjoyable. With its remarkable qualities and features, the HP OMEN 32C is an excellent choice for gamers seeking a high-performance, immersive gaming monitor.

Lag Free Always on Speed

Frame by frame, follow the action without interruptions. To keep things smooth, this OMEN 32C display has a quick 165Hz refresh rate to reduce motion blur, so every pixel moves with you. AMD FreeSync Premium technology effectively eliminates screen tearing and latency.

See the World You Want to Step Into

Mistake virtual for real with the immersive 1500R curve and sharp QHD quality images with HP OMEN 32C. Escape into a broad range of brilliant colors, hues, and tints for lifelike gaming, with 99% sRGB and 90% DCI-P3 color gamuts. HDR and up to 400 nits of brightness let you to see details and shading even in the shadows.

Smooth Gaming With 1ms Response Time and 165Hz Refresh Rate

The OMEN 32C has 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms Moving Picture Response Time (MPRT) reduce smearing and motion blur, making it excellent for fast-paced games requiring quick reactions to what's onscreen. Furthermore, Adaptive-Sync technology prevents screen tearing and choppy frame rates, resulting in ultra-smooth gameplay.

Refine Your Play Space

The OMEN 32C monitor is designed to wow both within and outside of the game, combines sophistication and fun to boost the appearance of a gaming setup. It has connectors for connecting your game PC, console, and even a business PC. Your desk will be just as you want it with the simple cable management and adjustable stand.

full_description:
HP OMEN 34C 34" 165Hz WQHD Curved Gaming Monitor

The HP OMEN 34C is a stunning 34-inch curved gaming Monitor that promises an immersive and engaging gaming experience. With a WQHD resolution of 3440 x 1440, it provides crisp and realistic pictures that boost the realism of your games and content. The monitor's VA panel provides a high refresh rate of 165Hz and a speedy 1ms GTG reaction time, providing smooth and responsive gameplay with minimum motion blur. Whether you're delving into fast-paced action games or exploring vast open worlds, the HP OMEN 34C provides great performance to meet your gaming needs. Connectivity is diverse, with 1 x DisplayPort, 2 x HDMI, and a 3.5mm audio connector, allowing for easy connection to your gaming PC, consoles, and other entertainment devices. The display also has AMD FreeSync technology, which eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for a smoother gaming experience. Furthermore, the Low Blue Light option reduces eye strain during prolonged gaming or viewing sessions. The 1500R curvature of the screen wraps around your field of view, increasing immersion and making each game session more exciting and lifelike. With its remarkable characteristics and features, the HP OMEN 34C is an excellent choice for gamers looking for a high-performance, immersive gaming monitor.

Ultra-Escapism

The excitement of OMEN 34C Monitor that comes with an ultrawide, curved display. Venture into the 1500R curve and be completely involved in the action. Take in enormous virtual landscapes on this 34-inch diagonal panel with a 21:9 aspect ratio.

See the World You Want to Step Into

With HP OMEN 34C, you may mistake virtual for real thanks to the immersive 1500R curve and brilliant QHD grade pictures. Escape into a wide spectrum of beautiful colors, hues, and tints for lifelike gameplay, with 99% sRGB and 90% DCI-P3 color gamuts. With HDR and up to 400 nits of brightness, you can see details and shading even in the shadows.

Smooth Gaming With 1ms Response Time and 165Hz Refresh Rate

The OMEN 34C The 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms Moving Picture Response Time (MPRT) eliminate smearing and motion blur, making it ideal for fast-paced games that necessitate quick reactions to what's on screen. Furthermore, Adaptive-Sync technology eliminates screen tearing and choppy frame rates, resulting in extremely smooth gameplay.

Refine Your Play Space

The OMEN 34C monitor is intended to wow both within and outside of the game, combining sophistication and entertainment to enhance the appearance of a gaming setup. It has connections for connecting your gaming PC, console, or even a business PC. With the simple cable management and adjustable stand, you can customize your desk exactly.

full_description:
HP OMEN 27 27" 165Hz FHD IPS Gaming Monitor

The HP OMEN 27 is a high-performance 27-inch gaming monitor that provides an immersive and seamless gameplay experience. With a Full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080, it provides clear and realistic graphics that bring games to life with brilliant colors and fine details. The monitor has an IPS screen, which ensures accurate color reproduction and broad viewing angles, allowing you to experience consistent and colorful pictures from any posture. The HP OMEN 27 excels in displaying fast-paced action and motion-heavy scenes without blurring or ghosting, thanks to its high refresh rate of 165Hz and quick 1ms GTG (Gray-to-Gray) reaction time. This guarantees that every frame is presented cleanly, allowing players to respond swiftly while remaining involved in the game. Whether you're playing fast-paced shooters, racing games, or exploring enormous RPG worlds, the monitor's high-performance display technology makes for an interesting and responsive gaming experience. The HP OMEN 27's connectivity choices are broad and uncomplicated, including one DisplayPort, one HDMI, and one 3.5mm audio port. This enables easy connection to gaming PCs, consoles, and external audio devices, allowing for a wide range of gaming settings and configurations. The HP OMEN 27 also comes with enhanced gaming capabilities to improve your gaming experience. It has AMD FreeSync and Adaptive Sync technologies, which match the monitor's refresh rate with the frame rate of your graphics card, eliminating screen tearing and stuttering and resulting in better gameplay. Furthermore, the display has a Low Blue Light option to alleviate eye strain during lengthy gaming sessions, allowing for more comfortable and longer gameplay. The HP OMEN 27 gaming monitor delivers a dependable and immersive experience by combining exceptional display quality, high refresh rates, short reaction times, and sophisticated gaming capabilities. Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive esports fan, the HP OMEN 27 is intended to suit your gaming requirements and improve your gaming experience.
